title: purpose of giving full effect to Council Regulation (EC) No. 1005/2008 of 29
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Illegal, Unreported
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Illegal, Unreported 

and Unregulated Fishing) (Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (illegal unreported unregulated fishing) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: purpose of giving full effect to Council Regulation (EC) No. 1005/2008 of 29
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries (Illegal, Unreported and Unregulated Fishing)
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries (Illegal, Unreported and Unregulated Fishing) 
Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 554 of 2010) are amended by substituting for the 
Schedule (as inserted by the Sea Fisheries (Illegal, Unreported and Unregulated 
Fishing) (Amendment) Regulations 2021 (S.I. 37 of 2021)) the following 
Schedule: 

1 O.J. L 286 of 29.10.2008, p.1. 
2 O.J. L 280 of 27.10.2009, p.5. 
3 O.J. L 26 of 30.1.2010, p.1. 
4 OJ L 115, 8.5.2010, p. 1 
5 O.J. L 57, 2.3.2011, p.10. 
6 OJ L 314, 29.11.2011, p. 2 
7 OJ L 105, 13.4.2013, p. 4 
8 OJ L 241, 10.9.2013, p. 1 
9 OJ L 84, 20.3.2020, p. 15 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th May, 2023.

title: purpose of giving full effect to Council Regulation (EC) No. 1005/2008 of 29
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This instrument adds Dunmore East, Glengad, Bunagee and Malin Head to those 
ports already designated for direct landings by fishing vessels registered to Third 
Countries outside the EU, allowing entry to the EU of such fishery products. It 
also amends the landing times at Greencastle port. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [264] 7
